data.title: Department of Administrative Services : Products and Services : Publishing & Distribution : State of Oregon
data.text:
Consultation

P&D is your single point of contact for publishing and distribution of products and services. Our resource experts will guide you through estimates, samples, price agreements, postal requirements and discounts, design projects, on-site training and project coordination.

Creative Services

Enhance your print and online marketing materials with professional design. Visit our Creative Services page to find out more.

File Preparation and Conversion

We provide high-quality output for all your publishing needs. Services include preflight, file conversion, document and image scanning, document tracking and more.

Digital Printing

P&D provides you with access to a full suite of printing services, including:

Quick copying

Full-color

Finishing

Variable data

Negotiable documents

Print Contracts

Jobs that cannot be produced in-house are bid out using P&D’s print contract services. We save customers time and money through:

Coordinating projects between customers and vendors

Developing bid specifications

Awarding contracts and issuing purchase orders

Monitoring vendor performance

Resolving conflict through consultation and mediation

Maintaining a list of pre-approved vendors

Production Mail

Production mail includes a variety of traditional mail processing services including design, variable data messaging, printing and mail metering services. P&D uses high-speed automated inserters and advanced postal software and sorting equipment to achieve the highest postal discounts possible on your mailing projects.

National Change of Address (NCOA) service is also available to ensure move updates are captured in your address files.

Each day, P&D’s metering team applies postage to thousands of mail pieces, helping agencies save money. Visit our Metered Mail page to find out more.

State Shuttle and Delivery

Security

The P&D facility offers level 3 restricted and level 4 critical security for the printing and mailing of highly confidential documents.
